title: BONUS PODCAST! Shattered Souls: The Car Barn Murders
itunes:title: BONUS PODCAST! Shattered Souls: The Car Barn Murders
description:
Attention true crime fans! Join us for a look at the hit new podcast 'Shattered Souls: The Car Barn Murders'. Veteran forensic investigator Karen Smith sets out to solve the oldest active cold case in the history of American true crime. Available now everywhere you get your podcasts!

Apple Podcasts

iHeart Podcasts

Spotify

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
